LanguageData.ButcherSpace_desc: Pawns will only do bills that produce rottable goods (butchering and cooking) when there is enough space in stockpiles or storage cabinets to store them.
LanguageData.DeadlockProtection_desc: Butcher or cook even without storage space if the colony has none of the product?
LanguageData.CookingEquivalency_desc: Should count meals as equivalent for purposes of Do until you have X bills?
LanguageData.MoveOrder_desc: Add new float menu order to move to clicked location when holding Shift?
LanguageData.PickupDropOrders_desc: Add new float menu order to carry (and drop) items when holding Shift?
LanguageData.TradingStockpiles_desc: Allows setting stockpiles as trading stockpiles, which will automatically set the items stored in them to be sold when a trade dialog is opened.
LanguageData.TradeStockpileOn_mouseOver: Click to disable autotrading for this stockpile.
LanguageData.TradeStockpileOff_mouseOver: Click to enable autotrading for this stockpile.
LanguageData.SurgeryEstimates_desc: Displays a small window when a surgeon is selected, estimating their chance of success.
LanguageData.BruiseWalkingOff_desc: Doctors will no longer waste medicine on injuries with no risk of permanent effects or infections.
LanguageData.SurgeryEstimateAccountForTraits_desc: Account for pawn traits (such as Optimist or Sadist) in surgery success estimate calculation. The better the doctor, the less do their personal biases affect their estimate.
LanguageData.SurgeryEstimationMode_option_AlwaysAccur: Everyone can accurately estimate odds of success or failure.
LanguageData.SurgeryEstimationMode_option_AccurateIfD: Everyone with basic medical training can accurately estimate odds of success or failure.
LanguageData.SurgeryEstimationMode_option_AccurateIfG: Only trained doctors can accurately estimate odds of success or failure.
LanguageData.SurgeryEstimationMode_option_AccurateIfA: Only exceptional, experienced doctors can accurately estimate odds of success or failure.
LanguageData.Surgery_ImpossibleOdds: "I've no clue what to do! This will never work!"
LanguageData.Surgery_TerribleOdds: "This is a really terrible idea. How do I do this again?"
LanguageData.Surgery_BadOdds: "I'll probably mess up, but it could work out..."
LanguageData.Surgery_AcceptableOdds: "I'm not confident, but it should work out."
LanguageData.Surgery_GoodOdds: "It could still go wrong, but I've got a good feeling about this."
LanguageData.Surgery_GreatOdds: "Should be easy enough. I know how to do this."
LanguageData.Surgery_AmazingOdds: "Piece of cake! I'll have it done before you can spell anesthetic!"
